data.title: Hybrid Program â€“ Horizon Christian School
data.text:
Students in the Horizon Christian Hybrid School program will benefit from a classroom setting on the Horizon campus with outstanding and dedicated teachers.

Your student will not only get top-notch educational classes but will have an opportunity to socialize with other hybrid students as well as campus students through field trips, lunch, sports, chapel and, of course, in the classroom.

The program is structured around a typical school schedule. On campus classes are on Friday, and field trips and athletics are scheduled in advance so you can best plan your time. Students 4th grade and up have additional online classes during the week.

Our Hybrid program gives your child an in-school experience where they benefit from Academic Achievement, Biblical Truth, and Christian Character Development.
